title: AN ACT relating to utilization controls for nonopioid analgesics in the Medicaid program.
subject: Drugs and Medicines
Fiscal Note
Medicaid
Opioids
Physicians and Practitioners
Public Assistance
Public Medical Assistance

abstracts.abstract: Create a new section of KRS Chapter 205 to prohibit the Department for Medicaid Services, any Medicaid managed care organization contracted by the department, and the Medicaid state pharmacy benefit manager from denying coverage for a nonopioid analgesic in favor of opioid analgesic or establishing more restrictive or more extensive utilization controls for nonopioid analgesics than the least restrictive or extensive utilization controls for any opioid or narcotic analgesic.
